actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 46 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the investment tax credit will apply to research and development expenditures.
short_title: Research and Development Incentive Act of 1979

summary.text: Research and Development Incentive Act of 1979 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the investment tax credit to research and experimental expenditures in connection with the taxpayer's trade or business.

titles.title: Research and Development Incentive Act of 1979
A bill to amend section 46 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the investment tax credit will apply to research and development expenditures.
